pages.text: Now with more robots!$(p)Kill endermen to get the two portal frame blocks (The upper Weathered Stone and the lower Mossy Stone)$(p)Sandwich a gold block between the two frame blocks and BOOM (literally) portal opens.$(p)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/misty-world)Click here to learn more about Misty World$(/l)
